title: go.tools/go/types: calling 2-arg builtin with 2-result f() call expression gives spurious error
body:
http://play.golang.org/p/nHzBsvVXfX

From go.tools/go/types: want success, got type error:
prog.go:12:10: invalid operation: not enough arguments for complex(complexArgs())
(expected 2, found 1)

(bug 5793 is the same bug for gc.)
